snippet: The top-ranked Djokovic won his fifth China Open title Sunday by defeating Tomas Berdych, and Sharapova outlasted Petra Kvitova.
abstract: Novak Djokovic wins his fifth China Open title and Maria Sharapova wins on women's side; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked Djokovic won his fifth China Open title Sunday by defeating Tomas Berdych, and Sharapova outlasted Petra Kvitova.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic and Maria Sharapova Reign in Beijing
